textos_fuente.text: About Us — O'Riley & Conway's Irish Pub 0 Skip to Content Home Menu About Events Booking A look inside Contact Open Menu Close Menu Home Menu About Events Booking A look inside Contact Open Menu Close Menu Home Menu About Events Booking A look inside Contact Happy out. It’s what we are all about. Like many Irish sayings, “ happy out” sounds like it originated after one too many pints. It’s meant to describe a feeling of happiness or contentment that is hard to put into words. That “all is right with the world” feeling. Here at O’Riley and Conway’s that’s what we’ve been after since the beginning. First opened days after prohibition, then as Quaerna’s, O’Riley and Conway’s maintains the oldest active liquor license in Rock County held by the same family. While it could be good ol’ Irish luck, we think our little slice of Dublin is here for a reason. That reason? All of the friends we’ve made along the way. Slainte! ☘️ STAY UPDATED Sign up to be the first to find out when we add beers, music, events, and more. We respect your privacy and will never share your information with any third-party vendors. Email Address Sign Up Thank you, friend! Our people will get in touch with your people. CONTACT friends@orileyandconways.com (608) 752-6099 Get Happy Out Copyright © 2025, O’Riley and Conway’s Irish Pub | All Rights Reserved. Designed by Loud Mouth Media

O'Riley & Conway's Irish Pub 0 Skip to Content Home Menu About Events Booking A look inside Contact Open Menu Close Menu Home Menu About Events Booking A look inside Contact Open Menu Close Menu Home Menu About Events Booking A look inside Contact What's on the menu? Pour a stout. Happy out! ☘️ At O’Riley and Conway’s Irish Pub, our mission is to be a true public house, where strangers are just friends you haven’t met yet. In addition to a warm, welcoming and friendly atmosphere, we offer one of the largest beer selections around, a scotch list the size of Rock County, and award-winning dishes from traditional pub fare to Irish Specialties. With live music every week and two bars for all your friends, O’Riley and Conway’s is a can’t miss - next time you’re in downtown Janesville. Need to reserve a seat? Contact us! “ “People who wonder whether the glass is half full or half empty miss the point. The glass is refillable.” -Simon Sinek ☘️ STAY UPDATED Sign up to be the first to find out when we add beers, music, events, and more. We respect your privacy and will never share your information with any third-party vendors. Email Address Sign Up Thank you, friend! Our people will get in touch with your people. CONTACT friends@orileyandconways.com (608) 752-6099 Get Happy Out Copyright © 2025, O’Riley and Conway’s Irish Pub | All Rights Reserved. Designed by Loud Mouth Media
